message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair.
I understand you wanting a larger share, but I think this split is more reflective of the even rounds remaining.  Let's not risk it going any further!
Bob, we're running out of time. This is my final offer above 50% - take it or leave it.
Alice, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this goes on much longer. I'm offering you a very fair deal.  Take it!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Meet me in the middle or it's going to hurt us both.
